resources.string:
If you reject permission, you can not use this service 

Please turn on permissions at 
[Setting] > [Permission]

Collect and monitor specific information about your device including your hardware model, operating system information, unique device identifiers like IMEI and serial number, WiFi information and mobile network information to uniquely identify the devices and ensure that unauthorized devices are not able to act on your behalf to generate unsecured transaction.
Collect and monitor information about the location of your device to show nearest Branch or ATM
Collect and monitor information about the location of your device to show nearest Branch or ATM
